awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 24 wins & 18 nominations.

fullplot: The film follows the fortunes of Charles and his friends as they wonder if they will ever find true love and marry. Charles thinks he's found "Miss Right" in Carrie, an American. This British subtle comedy revolves around Charlie, his friends and the four weddings and one funeral which they attend.
plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.
title: Four Weddings and a Funeral

tomatoes.consensus: While frothy to a fault, Four Weddings and a Funeral features irresistibly breezy humor, and winsome performances from Hugh Grant and Andie MacDowell.
